## ChromeNavLink interface


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ChromeNavLink 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [baseUrl](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.chromenavlink.baseurl.md) | <code>string</code> | The base route used to open the root of an application. |
|  [category](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.chromenavlink.category.md) | <code>AppCategory</code> | The category the app lives in |
|  [disabled](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.chromenavlink.disabled.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Disables a link from being clickable. |
|  [euiIconType](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.chromenavlink.euiicontype.md) | <code>string</code> | A EUI iconType that will be used for the app's icon. This icon takes precedence over the <code>icon</code> property. |
|  [hidden](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.chromenavlink.hidden.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Hides a link from the navigation. |
|  [href](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.chromenavlink.href.md) | <code>string</code> | Settled state between <code>url</code>, <code>baseUrl</code>, and <code>active</code> |
|  [icon](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.chromenavlink.icon.md) | <code>string</code> | A URL to an image file used as an icon. Used as a fallback if <code>euiIconType</code> is not provided. |
|  [id](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.chromenavlink.id.md) | <code>string</code> | A unique identifier for looking up links. |
|  [order](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.chromenavlink.order.md) | <code>number</code> | An ordinal used to sort nav links relative to one another for display. |
|  [title](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.chromenavlink.title.md) | <code>string</code> | The title of the application. |
|  [tooltip](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.chromenavlink.tooltip.md) | <code>string</code> | A tooltip shown when hovering over an app link. |
|  [url](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.chromenavlink.url.md) | <code>string</code> | The route used to open the  of an application. If unset, <code>baseUrl</code> will be used instead. |
